jcr:content.jcr:title: OTEX Redefined: New Leader Camp Experience

data.details:
SOMETHING NEW for ADULTS!

OTEX, Outdoor Training Extravaganza – is now the Adult Outdoor Camping Experience. After hearing so many requests for an “adult campout” experience, we are making some changes to the OTEX experience. We will offer training in canoeing, archery, CPR/First Aid and training to cook and camp outdoors. Everything will be prepared and made (cooked) by participants! We will work with box ovens and Dutch ovens. We will master cooking over the fire to create some fabulous meals. 

Selection of this session is for a day of New Leader Camp Experience. Session begins at 9am Saturday morning.

** fee includes lodging Friday and Saturday night, meals & snacks on Saturday and Sunday(note there are no sessions or meals planned for Friday evening or Saturday breakfast) and session materials. 

** all attendees must be registered for the 2016 Membership Year and approved volunteers.

Attendees will be certified to use our properties - Camp Kateri and North Fork - to take girls on outdoor adventures.
